text: Halpura (Hindi:हलपुरा) is a village and Gram panchayat in Bilhaur Tehsil, Kanpur Nagar district, Uttar Pradesh, India. Its village code is 149901. As per 2011 Census of India report the population of the village is 1924 where 1042 are men and 882 are women. ==References== Category:Villages in Kanpur Nagar district
title: Halpura
